reviewText: This seems to be just edited down from original live TV, British, I suppose.  It is lacking in cohesiveness and oftimes its hard to tell at what stage we are in the race.  Nonetheless, we do see quite a bit of the action.
Excellent race some spectacular video lacking in Radio Lemans commentary. Overall really well done always falls under favorites, when I'm milling around the house I reach for one of my lemans DVDs.
